connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

operatingsystem.description:
"description: 
 parameters:
     major:

       description: ''
     name:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: ''
     family:
       required: false

       description: ''

       type: array
       description: IDs of associated provisioning templates
     architecture_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: IDs of associated architectures
     os_parameters_attributes:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: Array of parameters
       parameters:
         name:
           required: false
           type: string

         value:
           required: false
           type: string
           description: Parameter value
     medium_ids:
       required: false

     provisioning_template_ids:
       required: false

     password_hash:
       required: false

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
